title: HQ / WASHBASIN
description: A washbasin An interactable dialogue where you can shave your beard/muttonchops! This changes the portrait in the mirror dialogue, and the one on UI.

dialogueTree.title: Washbasin: "On the table you see a bowl of wate..."
dialogueTree.text: On the table you see a bowl of water, a rough soap, and next to it a small hand mirror. A straight razor soaks inside the wash basin.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant throws you an embarr..."
links.text: The lieutenant throws you an embarrassed glance as you consider the washbasin.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Please attend to personal hygiene o..."
links.text: Please attend to personal hygiene on your own time.

dialogueTree.title: Washbasin: "On the table you see a bowl of wate..."
dialogueTree.text: On the table you see a bowl of water, a rough soap, and next to it a small hand mirror. A straight razor soaks inside the wash basin.

links.title: You: "Wash the smell of death off yoursel..."
links.text: Wash the smell of death off yourself.

links.title: Washbasin: "Thank god you didn't go in there ba..."
links.text: Thank god you didn't go in there barehanded! Death smell is notoriously difficult to get off yourself and your clothes though and cleaning up takes a while...

links.title: Washbasin: "But man persists and after fifteen..."
links.text: But man persists and after fifteen minutes pass, you look almost presentable. Sort of. The sudden absence of the morbid dead tissue smell instantly lifts your spirit.

links.title: Washbasin: "Scrubbing all the necrotic tissue o..."
links.text: Scrubbing all the necrotic tissue off your hands takes a while. The fingernails are especially hard. Death has made it's way into every nook and cranny...

links.title: Interfacing: "Should have used gloves. Detectives..."
links.text: Should have used gloves. Detectives use gloves, when they go rummaging around in someone's dead brain...

links.title: Washbasin: "But man persists and finally your b..."
links.text: But man persists and finally your bruised hands look clean and presentable... sort of. The sudden absence of the morbid dead tissue smell is uplifting.

links.title: You: "Is shaving the right call?"
links.text: Is shaving the right call?

links.title: Washbasin: "How would you know? You haven't eve..."
links.text: How would you know? You haven't even seen your face! Go take a peek in the mirror, then decide for yourself.

links.title: Washbasin: "The water reflects back a vague ima..."
links.text: The water reflects back a vague image of your face -- nose bulbous and red, hair unkempt, wrinkles lining the eyes and forehead. The 'stache is gigantic.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You'll be lookin' like a pansy with..."
links.text: You'll be lookin' like a pansy without the chops! A fuckin' pansy!

links.title: Composure: "A fresh start looms ahead. Clean yo..."
links.text: A fresh start looms ahead. Clean yourself up and be born anew.

links.title: You: "*Was* shaving the right call?"
links.text: *Was* shaving the right call?

links.title: Washbasin: "The water reflects back a vague ima..."
links.text: The water reflects back a vague image of your clean-shaven face. Despite the bulbous nose, unkempt hair and persistent swelling, you look... a little younger, maybe?

links.title: Logic: "You almost look like a professional..."
links.text: You almost look like a professional.

links.title: Suggestion: "Your face, such as it is. A regular..."
links.text: Your face, such as it is. A regular human face. Sans expression.

links.title: Suggestion: "The beardless nature of your cheeks..."
links.text: The beardless nature of your cheeks makes The Expression seem even more like a terrifying grimace.

links.title: You: "Time to shave. Get these mutton cho..."
links.text: Time to shave. Get these mutton chops off.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Like an artist with a brush or a ma..."
links.text: Like an artist with a brush or a master swordsman, you use the small mirror and the straight razor -- with some soap -- to remove all that unkempt hair from below the nose-line.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The sharp blade chafes against your..."
links.text: The sharp blade chafes against your skin, producing a scratching sound. The surface underneath the beard feels tender, the air brushing against it chilly.

links.title: You: "Feel your clean-shaven cheeks."
links.text: Feel your clean-shaven cheeks.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "They feel so smooth, surprisingly s..."
links.text: They feel so smooth, surprisingly so. A feeling of freshness overcomes you, as if you just came from a cold bath.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You don't have a face anymore. It's..."
links.text: You don't have a face anymore. It's all baby-ass now.

links.title: You: "Hope this was the right decision."
links.text: Hope this was the right decision.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Beneath the doubt sprouts a new vig..."
links.text: Beneath the doubt sprouts a new vigour, like you've discarded some bad decisions. It feels as though you've passed through a ritual. Emerged from cold water, even...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Yeah, purified yourself right back..."
links.text: Yeah, purified yourself right back to infancy. You look like a baby!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The sharp blade chafes against your..."
links.text: The sharp blade chafes against your skin, producing a scratching sound. The surface underneath the beard feels tender, the air brushing against it chilly.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Your hand shakes so hard you can't..."
links.text: Your hand shakes so hard you can't even muster up the courage to *try*. Maybe you're just too *wild* at heart?

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Your hand trembles as you scratch a..."
links.text: Your hand trembles as you scratch at your cheek... oh no, that's not how a grown man shaves!

links.title: You: "This isn't sharp enough. Scrape har..."
links.text: This isn't sharp enough. Scrape harder.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Stop, for crying out loud! You're g..."
links.text: Stop, for crying out loud! You're gonna cut your own throat.

links.title: Volition: "There's no way to salvage this."
links.text: There's no way to salvage this.

links.title: You: "I *need* to shave the chops!"
links.text: I *need* to shave the chops!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Your hand refuses to move another m..."
links.text: Your hand refuses to move another millimetre. A small trickle of blood runs down your cheek.

links.title: You: "Drop the razor in the water basin."
links.text: Drop the razor in the water basin.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The razor lands with a *clang*. A r..."
links.text: The razor lands with a *clang*. A red trickle begins to spread in the water.

links.title: You: "Leave it for now."
links.text: Leave it for now.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Thank god, I would have cut your th..."
links.text: Thank god, I would have cut your throat.

links.title: Volition: "The centipede is exaggerating -- pe..."
links.text: The centipede is exaggerating -- people don't actually cut their own throats when they're shaving. At least not accidentally.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
